overview:
MaDonna White Now: Temecula, CA Previous: Minneapolis, MN

Career: Former: Johnson & Johnson Company Current: CEO and Founder GotCHEERS.com (R), and Hidden Wineries Inc. (R) Author: Hidden Wineries of Southern California (c) Award-Winning 12 x 12; 4-color table-top book; Addy Award and International Creative Summit Awards.

Education: Pepperdine University; MBA-coursework. CSU-Long Beach; BS - Dual Degrees Universite d’ Ange, France; French Language CEO-space: Alumni LEC: Landmark Education Alumni

Volunteer: Founder: Hands Across the School (TM) Founder: Think Globally; Act Locally Founder: The Peace & Unity Conference (TM) Founder: Rooting for Mother Earth (TM)
